page.title: 14HOME LIFE 1 cont
page.content: Later on I usually watch television programmes such as "The Price is Right" and "The Hunter". After a glass of milk and a biscuit I go to bed around 9.30. I like Carrington because it is quiet and peaceful but it has its disadvantages. It does not have any shops or transport facilites. You would really need a car for transport as Gorebridge, the nearest town is 4 miles away. Special transport has to be arranged for Carrington school children and other isolated villages around.Scotland usually has more snow than England and in Winter the small villages in our area often become snowed in.
